name: Bouncing balls! (with swords)
description:
Welcome to the game! Be prepared for 1v1 battles against your friends in a multiplayer experience! (tip: reload the game to load back into the servers. It will avoid crashes) Please note this is not even close to the finished product. I just wanted to test it in a demo.

Coming soon:

health points

Improved art

Getting bug repellent to fix the bug in the menu
